text: ADITYA: You know, I don't really know Mihir personally, but he seems like a pretty chill dude. He's got that aura of kindness and gentleness, like he'd rescue a spider from the sink instead of squishing it. Plus, I've heard he's a productivity powerhouse - he could probably organize a chaotic office with one hand tied behind his back. But hey, don't let his calm demeanor fool you! Rumor has it he's got a bit of a wild side. Apparently, he used to have some anger issues, but now he just channels all that energy into the gym and hunting down bugs and vulnerabilities in code. Talk about turning a negative into a positive, right?
